amendment.description: Amendment increases transit capital funding by $3 billion to a total of $12 billion. The additional funds provide for $1.5 billion for the Transit Capital Formula Program and $1.5 billion for the New Starts program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 111-9 to increase transit capital funding by $3 billion.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nadler (NY) amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
